bio:
Istar Cairn-Breaker is a Nord warrior and a commander of the Stormcloak army.
He can be found inside a tent in the Haafingar Stormcloak Camp right next to Dragon Bridge, and can later be found in Castle Dour if the Stormcloaks are victorious against the Empire and take control of Solitude.
name: Istar Cairn-Breaker
